title: Bug 42072The call of the jspDestroy method violates it about the Java Servlet Specification 2.4, SRV.2.3.2.1.
description: Bug 42072The call of the jspDestroy method violates it about the Java Servlet Specification 2.4, SRV.2.3.2.1.
OB: When a JSP is accessed for a second time, the jspDestroy method is called evenif a ServletException is thrown from the init method of the class that extendsHttpJspPage.This violates the Java Servlet Specification 2.4, SRV.2.3.2.1.
